org.coniks.coniks_server

Class ConiksServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.ConiksServer

  • public class ConiksServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the main CONIKS server operations: interface to client, initiates Merkle tree rebuilding and signed tree root (STR) generation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConiksServer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ServerUtils.Record getRecord(long ep)
      Retrieves the "record" for epoch ep from the linked list representing the STR hash chain.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Sets up several configurations and begins listening for incoming connections from CONIKS clients.
      static void register(java.lang.String uname, java.lang.String pk)
      Adds a new name-to-key binding (uname, pk) to the pending registrations queue.
      static boolean updateHistory()
      Updates the server's STR history: inserts any pending registrations into the Merkle tree, takes a new snapshot of the whole directory, and adds a new link to the hash chain.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConiksServer

        public ConiksServer()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register(java.lang.String uname,
            java.lang.String pk)
        Adds a new name-to-key binding (uname, pk) to the pending registrations queue.

      • updateHistory

        public static boolean updateHistory()
        Updates the server's STR history: inserts any pending registrations into the Merkle tree, takes a new snapshot of the whole directory, and adds a new link to the hash chain.
        Returns:
        true if the update succeeded, false otherwise.

      • getRecord

        public static ServerUtils.Record getRecord(long ep)
        Retrieves the "record" for epoch ep from the linked list representing the STR hash chain.
        Returns:
        The record for epoch ep.
        Throws:
        An - UnsupportedOperationException in case the head of the list is reached before the requested record is found.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Sets up several configurations and begins listening for incoming connections from CONIKS clients.

        Usage: ./coniks.sh <start | stop | clean>
